entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet.exe: Need a specific error message when running a .dll of the wrong bitness #85691
  • [wasi] Tests fail to create a temp file in `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests`, and `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests` #85690
    8.0.0
  • Bug in the lock-free logic of DacEnumerableHash #85688
  • System.Net.Http.Tests.WarningHeaderValueTest.GetWarningLength_DifferentInvalidScenarios_AllReturnZero failing in CI #85687
    8.0.0
  • [Feature]: Meter Configuration and Pipeline #85684
    8.0.0
  • Failed to load libcoreclr.so on Raspberry Pi Zero 2W when running C# program using .NET Core Debugger (vsdbg) #85680
  • [wasm] `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests` *AOT* timing out, even though the tests ran to completion #85676
    8.0.0
  • [browser] V8 dying in the middle of application #85675
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] Cleanly delineate runtime, and application arguments #85674
  • JIT: Another missing normalize on load example #85672
  • Occasional crashes in System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Alpine 3.15 #85666
    8.0.0
  • Reload configuration not work for named options add with BindConfiguration extension method. #85665
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294.cmd #85663
    8.0.0
  • Directory path with special characters broken on MacOS Ventura 13.3.1 #85662
  • System.IO.Tests.RandomAccess_NoBuffering.ReadUsingSingleBuffer timing out #85659
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.Chunk (Array) #85653
  • coreclr_initialize failed on RISC-V (error 0x8007000E) #85650
  • Update Roslyn assemblies used in testing with `CORE_ROOT` #85644
  • Avoid libraries referencing 4.3.x packages #85641
    8.0.0
  • Vector{128|256}<T> == Vector{128|256}<T> could emit PXOR + PTEST combo on x86 #85638
  • Failures in System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest tests #85637
  • Spec update for Thread.Name property #85635
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Possible GC Hole from `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder.SourceGeneration.Tests` test run #85632
  • Assertion failed '!"Unknown operator for loop increment"' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #85631
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_DIV, GT_UDIV, GT_MOD)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #85630
  • Assertion failed '!"SSA check failures"' during 'Build SSA representation' #85629
  • Assertion failed 'isCandidateVar(fieldVarDsc) == isMultiReg' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #85628
  • Assertion failed 'refPosition->RegOptional()' during 'LSRA build intervals' #85627

Closed

  • [hot reload][coreclr] cumulative updates to properties in generic classes crash the runtme. #85605
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Incorrect exception modelling for INDEX_ADDR #85645
  • Crashes when initializing System.Net.Security.Native #83540
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] Invariant.Tests failing to run - regression #85616
    8.0.0
  • Mono WebAssembly AOT asserts if hybrid or cooperative suspend is used #47080
    Future
  • [merp] Add mono-hang-watchdog binary for crash reporting #32325
    Future
  • Address feedback from initial config binding generator PR #83531
    8.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] Failure for complex expression #85602
  • jitstress-random ComWrappersTestsBuiltInComDisabled is failing #85262
  • Wasm build hangs when using WasmEdge #85429
    Future
  • Test Failure - `Interop` work item #85591
  • CI tests not running all commands #85621
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [TEST] trying to use inline reloc for win-arm64 tls #85689
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rename IndexOfAnyValues to SearchValues #85686
    area-System.Buffers, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: Renable blazor lazy loading test #85685
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement Micrososoft.Bcl.Cryptography without System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms #85683
    area-System.Security
  • Fix building ReferenceTrackerRuntime.cpp in Interop tests #85682
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Disable failing tests to get CI green #85681
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • [debugger] Fix MDBGPROT_CMD_TYPE_ELEMENT_TYPE behavior #85679
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Disable some System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #85678
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85677
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add back IHtmlString to System.Web.HttpUtility #85673
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64: Add back the annotation in JitDisasm with the local var (+offset) #85671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.7 #85670
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.18 #85669
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't add duplicate suffix in LibraryImport code fix. #85668
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Make dependency on lld optional #85667
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Fix Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_DIV, GT_UDIV, GT_MOD)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #85664
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #85661
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.18
  • [wasm] Use monotonic clock in wasm, emscripten has it now #85660
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add GenericTypeParameterBuilder implementation and save a generic type into assembly. #85658
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Skip stp/ldp only for unwind portion of prolog/epilog #85657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #85656
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 7.0.7
  • JIT: Fix liveness for partial defs of parent locals #85654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2172154 #85652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable more ILLink tests in NativeAOT #85651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ProcessTests: allow WorkingSet to be zero just after launching the process. #85649
    community-contribution
  • Update File.cs #85648
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Allow forward sub to reorder trees throwing the same single exception #85647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Avoid S.R.I.RuntimeInformation package dependency #85642
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Shuffle some `MethodTable` flags #85634
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Print out the script that the CI script is running #85624
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Fix add/edit for generic methods scenario #85655
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Implement Vector128.Shuffle using tbl1 on arm64. #85553
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Fix modelling of exceptions thrown by INDEX_ADDR #85646
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move assignment rationalization to before the late helper expansion phases #85585
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • enable ntlm tests on RHEL7 again #85633
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Move SelfContained=true from pack to SDK #85636
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Combine `main` function for the default and single file bundle #85617
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo14::GetNonGCHeapBounds #85434
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ComWrappers test that allocate object can't inline #85583
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary dependency in M.Bcl.TimeProvider #85639
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Make generic composition information more efficient #85623
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Address misc feedback for config binder implementation #84737
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary dependencies in System.Text.Json #85640
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [JIT] X64 Fix - Handle 'imul' instruction variants to determine if a register was written to #85610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Support step over and pause multiple times in same line but different columns #85484
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure zroSimd12Elm3 is explicitly nulled out #85625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Prefer block copies for unenregisterable locals even with GC pointers #85620
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] ArmBase methods are now intrinsic. #85458
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Allow emitting function pointers in TypeSystemMetadataEmitter #85626
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix new warnings found with CA1854 improvement. #85613
    area-Meta, needs-area-label
  • Fix Helix command lines error code handling #85622
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Cleanup some xarch emit logic #85536
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT: Improve block unrolling, enable AVX-512 #85501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Enabling RuntimeEventSource in NativeAOT #85424
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Change default CFB feedback size for DES.Create() #85214
    area-System.Security
  • Fix TimeZoneInfo Perf #85615
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Move `ASG` rationalization to just after global morph #85494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean up dead code in ILCompiler targets #85618
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Generalize assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] es6 test main #85542
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix Diagnostic port suspension message doesn't report expected port name #85430
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set BuildAsStandalone for gcstress test builds #85284
    test-enhancement
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Skip DllImportSearchPathsTest on wasm #85588
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.x
  • fix JsonNode deserialising from null #85463
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Prefer lld in NativeAot when using clang #85478
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` faster encoding for change case. #85516
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #85510
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • offers the synchronous part of start and stop in IHostedService to run concurrently #85191
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion; add support for general recursive struct promotion #85569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allocate Array.Empty<> on a frozen segment (NonGC heap) #85559
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84807
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Improve Ascii (and Utf8) encoding #85266
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84806
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • fix(70460): Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • DependencyGraphViewer: Feature add same window navigation for NodeForm #84542
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove static modifiers from ThreadPool events in NativeRuntimeEventSource.PortableThreadPool.NativeSinks.cs #85563
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Transform indirect calls to direct ones in the importer #85197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
